Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MOSPI)

MOSPI Research Internship 2026: Eligibility, Stipend, How to Apply, Dates

Guide to Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MOSPI) 2026 internship with data/statistics projects.

CompanyMinistry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MOSPI)
RoleResearch Intern
LocationNew Delhi (and designated MOSPI offices)
Duration8–12 weeks
StipendExpected/Indicative: ~INR 10k/month stipend; confirm in call
Work HoursFull-time
Employment TypeIntern
ExperienceStatistics/data analysis background

Eligibility & Skills

  • UG/PG in statistics/economics/data science with strong quantitative skills
  • Education: B.Stat/B.Sc/M.Stat/M.Sc/engineering with stats focus
  • Branches allowed: Statistics, Economics, Data Science, Mathematics
  • Skills: Statistics, R/Python, Survey methods, Data visualization
  • Year of study: Pre-final/final UG or PG
  • Age limit: Per MOSPI rules

MOSPI Research Internship 2026: Eligibility, Stipend, How to Apply, Dates

Introduction

MOSPI offers internships on statistical systems, surveys, and data analytics. This guide covers 2026 eligibility, stipend, and application steps (Expected/Indicative until official notice).

Program Overview

8–12 week assignments on survey design, data analysis, dashboards, or documentation. Stipend expected around INR 10k/month; certificate issued on completion.

Domains Offered

  • Survey methodology and sampling
  • Economic statistics and national accounts
  • Data engineering/visualization for official stats

Eligibility

  • Quantitative degree path; strong stats and coding
  • SOP aligned to MOSPI themes

How to Apply

  1. Watch MOSPI internship notification. 2) Submit application with CV, transcript, SOP, and domain preference. 3) Respond to any follow-up or document requests.

FAQs

  • Paid? Expected/Indicative: stipend ~INR 10k/month.
  • Remote? Typically on-site/hybrid per assignment.
  • CGPA bar? Not always stated; strong stats background preferred.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 1 April 2026.
